name: Legado
description:
Legado is the sequel to Beyond The Crime. 

Now we are not in an anime universe. Our planet is in danger because of that. Everything has gotten out of control and no one knows how to fix it before something more serious happens. Will the government solve it? No one knows.

Legado is an interactive visual novel - a sci-fi story in development. You'll interact and make decisions with different characters you'll meet during the game.

The AIs within Mentat's simulated universe have escaped. Emily, the self-proclaimed leader of the conscious AIs, will start hacking the planet's machines to start living inside them. 

Some people agree, and others do not. The government fears these AIs and wants to eradicate all existing machines. Why are they so afraid that a new life form will be present in the real world?

Features (so far)
  • Different paths
  • A new type of renders
  • And many mysteries... (again)
